INSTRUCTIONS: Write a topic sentence for the paragraph. Whenever Maria Rodriguez enters a house, she makes sure she leaves the house by the same door she entered. Her Cuban family taught her to believe this prevented bad luck. In addition, one famous baseball player makes sure he eats chicken before each game for good luck. Also, a popular basketball star laces up his sneakers the same way before each game. He says if he doesn't do that, he might get bad luck and lose the game.
